description:
Dylan McLovin and Ricky M have a few things in common and one of them is that they love to go skinny dipping.

A couple of weeks ago, that's exactly what the two did. Well, at first they had they swimming trunks on, but once they started horse playing, the shorts quickly came off.

Apparently the warm water and sun jump started their sex drives, because the wrestling quickly turned into making out, and that quickly turned into a bunch of cock sucking. Luckily, we happen to enjoy filming guys getting it on, so you won't miss out on any of the action.

Enjoy!
title: Dylan McLovin & Ricky M
